docs.lead_paragraph: Prof Lasagna article on need to update Hippocratic oath; it, oath proposed by World Med Assn and one suggested by Lasagna quoted

headline.main: Would Hippocrates Rewrite His Oath? After 2,000 years, the Greek pledge traditionally taken by doctors is falling into disuse. A professor of medicine here stresses the need for a new declaration of ethics.

docs.abstract: Prof Lasagna article on need to update Hippocratic oath; it, oath proposed by World Med Assn and one suggested by Lasagna quoted
